name: Stories from 10 People I Once Knew - part 3
description:
About the objkt:
This writing had been made into a song and so for anyone collecting this piece, I will drop the song link to your Twitter DM. Cheers!

--


One day I met someone who made me wonder how good it is to be able to live closely to nature. I imagine waking up to a green scenery right outside my window, inhaling the real air that humans are supposed to breath in. 

Our modern way of living have set us apart from the nature and most of the time, we aren't aware of things that we do slowly destroy it. 

And it got me to a question; is there any chance that my future children be able to wake up to a green scenery right outside their windows, inhaling the real air that human are supposed to breath in?

--

Hi everyone! This is the third part of a series called “Stories from 10 People I Once Knew”. My writings in this series are responding to stories of 10 people that once have touched my heart and I’d like to share them to 100 other people.

Hopefully you can feel the stories together with me and you can re-share them to anyone else that might need warm words. 

Hugs,
YY
